comments.comments_text: GOAL! Christian Stuani (Girona) scores with a header from close range after Juanpe headed a pin-point lofted cross into his path. It's 1:2.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Superb finishing from Maximiliano Gomez (Celta Vigo). Jozabed plays a fantastic through ball and finds Maximiliano Gomez (Celta Vigo), who reacts quickly to get in front of the goalkeeper and fire a close-range shot into the right side of the goal. It's now 2:2.
